description: Here’s a roundup of some of the most innovative and unique gadgets of this year. They are known for their distinct design and new features. The list includes Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold, Apple's iPhone Air, Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 Glasses, Lenovo's ThinkBook Plus Gen 6 Rollable laptop, and Halliday smart glasses.
title: Most Innovative and Unique Gadgets of 2025: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold, iPhone Air and More

description: The year 2025 is coming to an end, giving us the perfect opportunity to do a recap of what all happened this year. Adam Mosseri, the head of Instagram, recently announced that the photo and video sharing app now has over three million monthly active users. While the platform achieved a notable milestone this year, it also marked the introduction of various new features to the app, including customisable algorithms, the ability to view one's history, a new reposts section, and the Instagram Map feature.
title: Year Ender 2025: Instagram Features Launched This Year, Including ‘Your Algorithm’, Watch History and More

description: Honor may be gearing up to launch the Magic 8 RSR Porsche Design sooner than expected, according to a new leak. The Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5-powered flagship is tipped to arrive ahead of the Chinese Spring Festival on February 17, following the recent debut of the Xiaomi 17 Ultra. Rivals such as the Vivo X300 Ultra and Oppo Find X9 Ultra are expected to launch later, after the festival. While their timelines remain unclear, the leak suggests Honor could take an early lead in China’s next ultra-flagship race.
title: Honor Magic 8 RSR Porsche Design With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC Could Launch in Early 2026

description: OpenAI has reset and doubled usage limits for its Codex tool until January 1, 2026, as a holiday promotion. Anthropic has also released a similar promotion for its Claude Pro and Max subscribers, who will receive double usage limits from December 25–31 on Claude services. Both adjustments are temporary and revert to normal levels once the period ends.
title: OpenAI, Anthropic Offer Double the Usage Limit to Select Users Till the New Year

description: WhatsApp rolled out multiple updates this year that refined everyday messaging, calling, and privacy features without changing the app’s core structure. New tools made chats more expressive, added AI-assisted writing and summaries, improved call planning, and expanded Channels and Status discovery. The app also strengthened privacy with passkey-encrypted backups and private AI processing, while extending support to more devices like the Apple Watch. The changes seem to focus on small, practical improvements that reflect evolving usage habits while keeping private communication central.
title: Year Ender 2025: WhatsApp Features Launched This Year

description: Honor Win and Honor Win RT were launched in China on Friday. They were launched in three colour options, with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage. They feature a 6.83-inch display and a 10,000mAh battery. They run on Snapdragon chipsets and a 50-megapixel selfie shooter. Honor Win has a triple rear camera unit, while the Win RT model has dual rear cameras.
title: Honor Win, Win RT With 10,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon Chipsets Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung and SK Hynix are reportedly set to begin mass production of sixth-generation high-bandwidth memory chips (HBM4) in 2026. The AI-optimised memory is expected to first roll out from Samsung in February, followed by SK Hynix around September, with much of the output earmarked for Nvidia’s Vera Rubin AI accelerators. Neither company’s HBM4 is likely to reach consumer products initially, prolonging the broader RAM shortage.
title: Samsung to Reportedly Start Manufacturing Its Next-Gen AI Memory Chip in 2026

description: The smartphone calendar for 2026 is already shaping up to be as busy, if not more, compared to recent years. Major brands have planned big releases across price segments, driven by encouraging introductions this year. So, if buying a new smartphone is on your mind in the new year, then it might be prudent to wait a little while. From the iPhone 18 series to the Samsung Galaxy S26 lineup, here’s a look at the top upcoming smartphones in 2026.
title: Upcoming Smartphones in 2026: iPhone 18 Series, Samsung Galaxy S26 Series, Realme 16 Pro Series 5G, and More

description: BMSG FES’25 – GRAND CHAMP marks five years of BMSG with a thrilling four-hour outdoor concert featuring SKY-HI and the label’s top artists. Packed with emotion, unity, choreography, and 66 live songs, the concert film is now streaming on Prime Video India.
title: BMSG FES’25 – GRAND CHAMP Concert Film Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: Bridgerton Season 4 returns on Netflix in two parts as Benedict Bridgerton meets mysterious Sophie at a dazzling masquerade ball, leading to secrets, romance, and wedding bells under the guidance of directors Tom Verica and Jaffar Mahmood in this chapter.
title: Bridgerton Season 4 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is currently available for free on Epic Games Store on PC. The acclaimed RPG can be redeemed on the storefront till December 26. The game arrives free as a part of Epic's Holiday season offerings. Epic Games Store's next free game will be revealed later on December 26.
title: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut Is Free Right Now on Epic Games Store: How to Redeem

description: Google’s NotebookLM could soon get two new upgrades to its popular Audio Overviews feature. As per the report, the tool could get a new Lecture mode, which is designed to help users gain a thorough understanding of a topic. The new mode is said to be added to the existing four modes and will become the longest audio-generating feature of Audio Overviews.
title: Google’s NotebookLM to Reportedly Add a Lecture Mode to Audio Overviews; Teases New British Accent

description: Honor Power 2 has surfaced on Geekbench, revealing a MediaTek Dimensity 8500 chipset, 12GB RAM, and Android 16 with MagicOS 10. The benchmark scores suggest only modest gains over the Dimensity 8400. Design leaks, shared by a Chinese tipster, show a rear layout similar to Apple’s latest iPhone Pro models. The phone is tipped to feature a 6.79-inch 1.5K OLED display, a massive 10,000mAh battery with 80W charging, and could launch in China in January 2026.
title: Honor Power 2 Spotted on Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 8500 SoC; iPhone Pro-Like Design Leaks

description: iQOO Z11 Turbo is now available for pre-order in China via the Vivo online store, the company has announced. The listing of the phone reveals the design of its back panel. The handset is shown with a square-shaped rear camera module, housing a dual camera unit. The power button and volume controls appear on the right side of the frame. Separately, the iQOO Product Manager has confirmed various details about the upcoming handset, including its price range, chipset, display, and camera configuration.
title: iQOO Z11 Turbo Price, Chipset, More Details Revealed Ahead of Launch: See Expected Features

description: Lenovo Watch GT Pro has been launched in China. The new model has a 1.43-inch display with 466x466 resolution. It supports over 170 sports modes and carries a 470mAh battery. The wearable can track heart rate, blood oxygen saturation (SpO2), and sleep. It supports Bluetooth calling as well. The Lenovo Watch GT Pro provides customisable watch faces and is compatible with both Android and iOS devices.
title: Lenovo Watch GT Pro Launched With 1.43-Inch Display, SpO2 Monitor: Price, Specifications

description: Madden is an upcoming American Biographical film that is set to land on Thanksgiving 2026. It will stream on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Madden OTT Release Date Revealed: When and Where to Watch John Madden’s Starrer Online?

description: Nvidia is reportedly purchasing the artificial intelligence (AI) chip designer Groq’s assets. As per the report, the chipmaker is acquiring the AI inference technology assets for a price of $20 billion (roughly Rs. 1.79 lakh crore). The amount is nearly threefold of Groq’s recent valuation of $6.9 billion (roughly Rs. 61,986 crore), at which the company raised $750 million (roughly Rs. 6,740 crore).
title: Nvidia Is Reportedly Acquiring AI Chip Designer Groq’s Assets for $20 Billion

description: The Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold was launched in select global markets last month as the first triple-foldable foldable smartphone from the South Korean tech conglomerate. While Samsung claims it to be highly sturdy, a recent durability test of the smartphone carried out by a popular YouTuber suggests that it may not be able to withstand as much abuse as the Galaxy Z Fold 7, with the screen giving way during the bend test.
title: Samsung’s Galaxy Z TriFold Display Breaks in Bend Test, Raising Durability Concerns

description: Stranger Things Season 5 is generating major buzz across media and fan communities as the franchise’s emotional finale unfolds. Discussions highlight returning cast, darker mysteries, and the climactic fight against Vecna. Social networks, review platforms, and entertainment portals praise its nostalgia, suspense, and satisfying closure, keeping global audiences eagerly engaged.
title: Stranger Things Season 5 Volume 2 Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: This guide will help you choose the best laser printers available from different brands like HP, Canon, and more. The list offers a comprehensive look into different features, along with a dedicated buying guide to help you choose the right printer.
title: Top 5 Laser Printers to Buy in India Right Now

description: OnePlus Turbo series will be launched soon in China, the smartphone maker announced on Thursday via a social media post. Additionally, the lineup is now available for pre-order in the country via the Oppo China online store. Other details about the upcoming handset, including its key specifications, exact launch date, features, pricing, and colourways, remain under wraps. This comes soon after the purported live images of the OnePlus Turbo surfaced online.
title: OnePlus Turbo Series Launch Teased, Pre-Orders Open in China: See Expected Specifications

description: Asus is rumoured to enter the DRAM manufacturing space next year. A new rumour claims that the company has already laid out the roadmap for the same, and production lines could be set up by the end of the second quarter of 2026. Interestingly, the rumour comes at a time when the consumer tech market is dealing with an AI-led global RAM shortage.
title: Asus Could Start Making Its Own RAM in 2026 Amid Global RAM Shortage

description: Crypto markets stayed defensive as Bitcoin traded in a narrow range amid thin holiday liquidity and macro uncertainty. Analysts pointed to options activity, stablecoin flows, and institutional positioning as key drivers, while altcoins lagged due to subdued risk appetite. Market participants remain focused on liquidity conditions and policy signals for direction.
title: Bitcoin Steadies as Holiday Trading Sets the Tone

description: GTA: Tokyo "almost happened" at Rockstar Games, according to former technical director at Rockstar North Obbe Vermeij. In a new interview, the former Rockstar dev talked about why GTA games don't explore settings outside of the US. Vermeij also discussed GTA 6 and its rumoured pricing.
title: GTA: Tokyo 'Almost Happened', GTA 6 'Probably' Won't Be $100, Says Former Rockstar Technical Director

description: Written and directed by Kumaar L., Love U Muddu is a Kannada romance drama film that is set to stream from tonight, exclusively on Amazon Prime Video in multiple languages.
title: Love U Muddu OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Kannada Romantic Drama Online?

description: The Poco M8 5G is expected to be launched in India soon, as part of the latest M8 lineup that may also comprise a Pro variant. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the Xiaomi subsidiary has teased the design of the upcoming handset and confirmed its availability. It appears to have a similarly designed rear camera deco as the upcoming Redmi Note 15 5G. The teaser suggests that the Poco M8 5G will debut with a 50-megapixel AI camera system.
title: Poco M8 5G Teased with 50-Megapixel AI Camera Ahead of India Launch; Flipkart Availability Confirmed

description: Motorola’s upcoming flagship smartphone has appeared on China’s 3C certification database, confirming 90W wired fast charging and a China launch. The device, listed as XT2603-1, is tipped to debut as the Motorola X70 Ultra in China and launch globally as the Edge 70 Ultra. Previous listings suggest Android 16, a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 5 chipset, and up to 16GB RAM. The listing also aligns with Flipkart’s recent teaser for Motorola’s premium Signature series in India.
title: Possible Motorola Edge 70 Ultra Spotted on 3C Database With 90W Fast Charging Support

description: Realme 16 Pro 5G is confirmed to launch in India on January 6, 2026, alongside the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G. Leading up to its much-anticipated launch, the company has been teasing the key specifications of the smartphone. Now, the tech firm has confirmed that the Realme 16 Pro 5G will be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Max 5G chipset, paired with a 7,000mAh Titan Battery. It is also confirmed to sport a 1.5K resolution AMOLED display, delivering up to 144Hz refresh rate.
title: Realme 16 Pro Chipset, Battery, and More Revealed Ahead of January 6 India Launch: See Expected Specs

description: WhatsApp is reportedly testing a new feature that will allow WhatsApp group admins to share a channel invite with their contacts. This functionality is said to be rolling out via the TestFlight beta Programme, with the 25.37.10.74  beta version for iOS. It is reportedly available to some beta testers. Admins can select up to 64 contacts at once to share the invite.
title: WhatsApp May Soon Allow Channel Admins to Share Invite Links With Contacts on iOS

description: Xiaomi Watch 5 has been launched in China as the latest addition to the company’s smartwatch lineup. The new wearable sports a 1.54-inch AMOLED display, housed inside a circular dial. The screen offers up to 1,500 nits of peak brightness and 480x480 pixel resolution. It packs a 930mAh battery. The latest Watch 5 from the Chinese smartphone maker is currently available for pre-order in the country, and is offered in four colour options. It also ships with various health tracking features, too.
title: Xiaomi Watch 5 Launched With 1.54-Inch AMOLED Display, EMG Sensor: Price, Specifications

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) has launched a new prepaid recharge plan for users in India. The state-owned telecom operator made the announcement via its social media handle on Thursday while providing more details about what this Christmas-themed prepaid recharge plan offers. Dubbed Christmas Bonanza, it a limited-time recharge plan which provides consumers with 2GB of 4G data per day, unlimited calls, along with other benefits, at a very nominal price.
title: BSNL Christmas Bonanza Plan Announced With 2GB of Daily Data and Unlimited Calls: Price, Benefits

description: The iPhone 18 series is expected to be the first to use US-made camera sensors, adding Samsung’s Austin, Texas, foundry to Apple’s supply chain, previously dominated by Sony in Japan. Reports suggest the shift may favour the Pro models. The South Korean tech giant has reportedly started looking for project managers for the fab, and production could begin in March 2026.
title: iPhone 18 Series to Reportedly Get US-Made Camera Sensors From Samsung

description: Apple may launch the iPhone Air 2 earlier than expected, according to a tipster, who claims the handset will debut at Apple’s 2026 fall event in early September. The claim contradicts reports suggesting a delay to 2027. The leaker also says the iPhone 17e is already in mass production for a spring launch. The iPhone Air 2 is expected to add a second rear camera and other refinements, as Apple continues to explore slim phone designs despite mixed market response.
title: iPhone Air 2 Tipped for Fall Launch as Apple Rethinks Slim Phone Strategy

description: ISRO successfully launched the 6.1-tonne BlueBird Block-2 communications satellite for US firm AST SpaceMobile using its LVM3 rocket. The mission set a new payload record for an Indian launcher and showcased India’s growing role in commercial heavy-lift launches and space-based cellular connectivity.
title: ISRO Sets Record with LVM3 Launch of BlueBird Block-2 Communications Satellite: Five Things to Know

description: Xiaomi 17 could be making its debut in the Indian market soon. The details are yet to be officially announced by Xiaomi. The purported Indian variant of the handset has been allegedly spotted on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website. The Xiaomi 17 was launched in China in September. It runs on  Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, paired with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of storage.
title: Xiaomi 17 Visits BIS Certification Site, Likely to Launch in India Soon

description: Xiaomi Buds 6 has been launched in China as the successor to last year’s Buds 5. The new true wireless stereo (TWS) offers active noise cancellation (ANC) and Harman-tuned Golden Ear audio. It also gets Harman EFX and Master Mode. The Buds 6 also support spatial audio and summary generator. The Chinese tech firm claims that the TWS ships with an IP54 rating for dust and water resistance. Moreover, the Buds 6 will go on sale in China on December 27 in four colourways.
title: Xiaomi Buds 6 Announced With Harman-Tuned Audio, Up to 35 Hours of Total Battery Life: Price, Specifications

description: Google appears to be preparing for the rollout of a major change that will impact millions of users, but in a good way. The Mountain View-based tech giant has updated its support page, which mentions that users can finally change their Gmail address without losing access to their account. The first part of the email address, prior to “@gmail.com”, can be changed by the user, and their Google account will stay the same, including contacts, Drive files, emails, and photos.
title: Google to Soon Let You Change Gmail Address Without Losing Access to Your Account

description: Motorola has teased a new premium Signature smartphone series in India through an app-only Flipkart microsite. The teaser uses Motorola’s batwing logo and Pantone colour cues and asks users to return on December 28 for more details. The move follows leaked renders of a device codenamed Urus, which were earlier rumoured to be the Edge 70 Ultra. Reports suggest a flagship phone with a 6.7-inch 1.5K OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, and triple 50-megapixel rear cameras.
title: Motorola Signature Series India Launch Set for Flipkart Reveal This Week

description: Samsung appears to be gearing up for the release of the Galaxy A07 5G. The unannounced smartphone has appeared in multiple certifications previously and has now been spotted at Brazil's National Telecommunications Agency (Anatel). The listing confirms the battery capacity of the phone. The battery capacity may be larger than that of its predecessor. Samsung released the 4G variant of Galaxy A07 in India in October.
title: Samsung Galaxy A07 5G Anatel Certification Suggests Larger Battery Than Its Predecessor

description: OnePlus Turbo is expected to be launched in China soon as a new gaming-focused smartphone. Ahead of its anticipated debut, live images of the upcoming model have surfaced, revealing its design and key specifications. It carries a familiar rear camera layout, with the square-ish deco at the top-left corner. The OnePlus Turbo appears to have a glossy rear panel, which hints towards a potentially aggressive pricing.
title: OnePlus Turbo Live Images Reportedly Reveal Design, Colourways and Key Specifications
